item.title: Deploying NGINX in K3s
item.description: Deploy a NGINX ReplicaSet into your K3s cluster and confirm the discovery of your NGINX deployment. Run a load test to create metrics and confirm them streaming into Splunk Observability Cloud! 1. Start your NGINX Verify the number of pods running in the Splunk UI by selecting the WORKLOADS tab. This should give you an overview of the workloads on your cluster. Note the single agent container running per node among the default Kubernetes pods.
